text:
Sure! Just two things. If you could explain me a few things about How long have been animating? Why are you doing this animation? Do you prefer to do feature or vfx anim? This kind of stuff, that could be worth to me. That will help me a lot!
The other thing, would be nice, if you are able to upload your anim to a free platform called "Syncscketch". It's awesome to give proper feedback. :slightly_smiling_face:

sure, So i have been animating since January this year. I did try it a few years ago but i didn't enjoy it so i moved onto trying other things, anyway I went back to it this January and since then its the only thing I've done/specialized in. I'm currently working on a dragon animation because I wanted to try and challenge myself with a weight piece and try my hand at a creature animation. I've never really done anything like this, the only creature I've animated before was a bird and that was just a quick block. ohhhhh I definitely prefer feature animation, I love acting character references out. I do however like the look of VFX but it doesn't really have a place for character animation, it seems only one film comes up every so often that fits the character animation criteria like Paddington or detective pikkachu :slightly_smiling_face:
heres the link to my work on syncsketch (i just checked it out and it seems cool)
